Enhance carrier-broker communication effortlessly with a plugin that enables carriers to send emails directly from the loadboard with just one click.

- Minimize time spent on tedious copying and pasting activities.
- Reduce stress and worries associated with load-booking tasks.
- Maximize focus and efficiency in securing load bookings.

You can use your account as is, straight out of the box, or customize it to suit your specific requirements.

- Quick registration
- Easy Account Setup
- Ready in less than 60 seconds.

Install Click2Load Google Extension
All it takes is a single click to install the extension.

- No limit on daily emails
